returnValues.name: hasBeenActive
returnValues.description: Indicates if the user has performed at least one interaction (sticky activation) since the page loaded.

returnValues.name: isActive
returnValues.description: Indicates if the user has interacted with the page recently enough to allow 'gated' APIs (transient activation).

returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: Indicates whether the UserActivation API is supported in the current browser.

returnValues.name: refresh
returnValues.description: Manually triggers a re-read of the navigator.userActivation state.
